title: Skin ward don't show up!
body:
Ok, my username is Whixe. I recently get a ward skin from a chest. But when i make it to permanent but it didnt show up and i cant use.
Can't find it too. The Ward Skin is "Rising Dawn Ward"!! Wish riot can fix or help me with this!

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it doesn't look like the Rising Dawn Ward skin was unlocked.  it appears that have been disenchanted yesterday, for 213 orange essences.  It's important to be super careful with the action you are taking and confirming for a shard, because it's not something we currently provide refunds for.  Still, 213 orange essences are a good amount and I hope you can unlock some really cool stuff with it!
Oh! sorry, it was my fault that i didnt see carefully. i wanted that skin, really cant help me with that?
